alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 11:06AM EST until March 07 at 5:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Tippecanoe River above Winamac affecting White, Pulaski and Carroll Counties. Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Fulton IN, Starke, Marshall, Kosciusko and Pulaski Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana... Eel River at North Manchester affecting Cass IN, Whitley, Miami, Wabash and Kosciusko Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River near Linn Grove. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The flooding of county roads begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 12.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
